report.title: Simple Extraction, Simple Experiance
report.author: Spacy
report.bodytext: I have read many reports on Lactuca and failed attempts to achieve the effects wanted. I have found by doing a simple isopropyl extract and then applying the product to a cigarette you can get better results. /n /n Extraction /n /n 1. First place material in a suitable container and add isopropyl alcohol. /n /n 2.Let sit for at least 1 day. Shake whenever you happen to pass by. /n /n 3. After letting soak for a day strain and place liquid in a pyrex baking tray or beaker. /n /n 4. Heat on low heat until you are left with a tar or thick liquid. /n /n Useage /n /n 1. Take some on the end of a butter knife or other tool and spread on a cig. /n /n 2. Leave about 1/4 of an inch clean from the tip of the cig. /n /n 3. Light and Enjoy.
